entry.title: You‚Äôre Safe, I‚Äôm Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,121Chapters: 14/22Kudos: 22

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight‚Äîtoo tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. ‚ÄúDunbar,‚Äù he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn‚Äôt have, ‚Äúyou‚Äôre clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.‚Äù

entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,022Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 117

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills‚Äô magic, he runs ‚Äì straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn‚Äôt know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should‚Äôve terrified him ‚Äì and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah‚Äôs steady grace, Kol‚Äôs mischief, Klaus‚Äô possessive charm, and Peter‚Äôs return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor ‚Äì and what, and who, he‚Äôs willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: Eichen Fallout
entry.summary:
Author: mieczyslawstilinskihale

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,066Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Supernatural... sometimes it can feel so human. Stiles and Isaac first met during stressful situations. Isaac grew up in an extremely abusive household with a father he believes is a serial killer. Stiles, an orphan, was stuck at Eichen, which housed both adult and juvenile wards on the same property. One fateful night, Stiles, feeling overwhelmed by the abuse‚Äîthe constant torture and testing‚Äîdecided to escape. He ran to a place where he felt safe, which was a place Isaac didn't. Years later, they meet again, and this time it wasn't a chance encounter. Stiles had been adopted by the Sheriff and was attending his senior year. Even though they had only met once, the two sort of became a comfort to each other when it came to feeling unsafe. Stiles always thought he would be safe once he was out of Eichen, but he was in more danger with a bunch of Cultists connected to Eichen stalking him and his friends... and what is believed to be the savior growing in Stiles' belly.

entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,589Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 4

Summary: Melissa McCall muses on her son growing up, her blossoming romance with the Sheriff, and her strained relationship with Rafael. In the wake of Void's destructive actions, memory becomes a powerful tool. Natalie Martin, meanwhile, ponders her choices. Hiding her banshee powers, watching helplessly as Lydia harnessed her abilities in a way Natalie never could. Her choice, now, to return to a world that she hoped long ago to leave behind. Or; Anyway, your ex husband calls you once a week to ask about your son. It is always at an awkward time, never consistent, and leaves you feeling generally unsatisfied, which means nothing much has changed about your relationship.
